Text: Directors Regional PRC Cc may know the Directors Regional PRC will be carried out on November th in Sao Paulo In that meeting both Andrea Calo and Fabian Valle will be represented by John Novak and as you are their supervisor I would appreciate if you can send the consolidated feedback to John before the meeting for him to present to the committee Thanks Erica

Yearend performance reviewsremember to have the Performance Review meeting with your employee prior January th and send me the Evaluation form signed by you and the employee If your employee has participated in the PRC meetings please get in contact with hisher PRC representative in order to get hisher feedback and last rating for your employee That rating will be the final one Julie Ariel Bruch Martha Veronica Leppez and Laura Feldman Jose Guillermo Canovas Rob Guillermo Atenor Brett Federico Cerisoli Mark Andrea Calo Jeffrey Luis Juarros Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Erica
